html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02732025-03-05TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (RPAS – Beyond Visual Line-of-Sight and Other Operations)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (RPAS – BEYOND VISUAL LINE-OF-SIGHT AND OTHER OPERATIONS) in order to (1) allow operations with a remotely piloted aircraft (RPA) up to 150 kg to be flown within visual line-of-sight; (2) introduce rules for routine beyond visual line-of-sight operations with an RPA up to 150 kg over sparsely populated areas, at low altitudes, and in uncontrolled airspace; (3) remove the requirement for a special flight operations certificate for these operations; (4) include requirements for a new pilot certification, new technical standards for the aircraft and supporting systems, new operational procedures and new requirements for individuals and organizations; and (5) update existing service fees and introduce new fees for the new services.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0070 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (RPAS – BEYOND VISUAL LINE-OF-SIGHT AND OTHER OPERATIONS) in order to (1) allow operations with a remotely piloted aircraft (RPA) up to 150 kg to be flown within visual line-of-sight; (2) introduce rules for routine beyond visual line-of-sight operations with an RPA up to 150 kg over sparsely populated areas, at low altitudes, and in uncontrolled airspace; (3) remove the requirement for a special flight operations certificate for these operations; (4) include requirements for a new pilot certification, new technical standards for the aircraft and supporting systems, new operational procedures and new requirements for individuals and organizations; and (5) update existing service fees and introduce new fees for the new services.
